application_type_full: Approval of details reserved by a condition (discharge)
description: Details pursuant to the discharge of Conditions 5 (Details of materials), 6 (Landscape Scheme), 7 (Demolition and Construction Management Plan), 9 (Details of privacy screens), 10 (Servicing and Delivery Plan), 11 (Plant room) and 12 (Floodlighting) of planning permission ref. 46463/APP/2024/1861, dated 16-09-2024 (Variation of Conditions 2 (Approved Plans) and 8 (Parking Spaces) of planning permission reference 46463/APP/2023/2279, dated 19-04-2024 for 'Conversion of the first floor and loft space to create 3 x 2-bed and 1 x 1-bed flats with ground floor extension for relocation of existing Chandlery.' Amendment to the development area and construction of two additional roof dormers.)
